title: Da Wei Bei Ken Zhi Daomei Tegong Xiong
title_japanese: 大卫贝肯之倒霉特工熊
synopsis: With the over-exploitation of natural resources by humans, the Arctic environment is completely destroyed, leaving only the last polar bear to survive. The human girl Jessica adopted this polar bear and named him Bacon. Jessica is an excellent agent of the Ministry of Security. Although Bacon also dreamed of being an agent, he was clumsy and always getting into trouble, he could only do cleaning work in the security department. The mysterious organization of polar bears that suddenly appeared and planted bombs all over the world, claiming to retaliate against mankind. In order to remove the bomb threat, the highest decision-making body of mankind, the Global Alliance, sent security agents to sneak into the polar bear base, but unexpectedly there was a human detector in the base, which made the infiltration fail. The Global Alliance had to train Bacon as an agent and send it to the polar bear base. Jessica secretly accompanied him, worried about Becken's safety. Bacon and Jessica have encountered many obstacles in the polar bear base, but they are always able to make mistakes. Although they finally resolved the bomb crisis, Bacon was caught. The leader of the mysterious organization revealed the amazing truth to Beacon... and the Global Alliance is preparing to abandon Beacon and launch a full-scale attack on the polar bear organization...(translated from douban)
